entityId.localType: State Records Office Of Western Australia Reference code

nameEntry.part: Administration Files - South West District Office [annual single number sequence]

biogHist.abstract: Administration and personal/welfare files of the South West District Office (also known as the Southern District office) of the Department of Native Affairs and the Department of Native Welfare. The files are concerned with education, health, housing, employment, welfare, missions and reserves. Gnowangerup, Narrogin, Collie, Katanning, Kojonup, Broomehill, Dumbleyung, Tambellup and Borden are included in this district. This filing system was discontinued in 1962 for the administrative files and was replaced by a new system that was introduced throughout State offices of the Department of Native Welfare. Record Series No. 47 lists the files from the Southern District under this new system. However, this filing system was continued for the personal welfare-based files up until 1972.
biogHist.p: Access to these records is restricted to protect the privacy of individuals. You are very welcome to enquire.
